content: Stemming from the operation of our initial four tankers, our revenues came in at $5.1 million, 28% higher than our revenues in the fourth quarter of '21. Looking at our income statement for Q1 '22 against Q1 '21 on Slide 8, revenues came in at $5.1 million, at same levels as in Q1 '21, but 28% higher than the previous quarter, Q4 '21, as all vessels were on period charters. Please ask your question. Please ask your question. Please ask your question. Please ask your question.
